ygData.subject: Evil Eye Runes for Crafted
ygData.msgSnippet: Anyone actually done this part? I heard somewhere that two runes are off normal EEs, and the 3rd is off Borxx. And, we killed him twice last night and no Rune
ygData.messageBody:
Anyone actually done this part? I heard somewhere that two runes are off
normal EEs, and the 3rd is off Borxx. And, we killed him twice last night
and no Rune of the dwarves or whatever... *sigh*



-----Original Message-----
From: Lanadina the Magician [mailto:lanadina@...]
Sent: Tuesday, September 14, 1999 8:30 AM
To: EQCheats@onelist.com
Subject: RE: [EQCheats] Re: Crafted Greaves


From: "Lanadina the Magician" <lanadina@...>

Borxx is in RunnyEye...but I have NEVER seen him drop those Runes. They are
on Evil Eyes within RunnyEye, but havent seen them on her. Borxx drops the
lens for the Staff of the Observers Quest...you may want to hunt the EEs in
RunnyEye...I've heard people shouting in the zone that they got runes off of

them =)

Lanadina
